parameters.Title: Make CBAM declarations a natural part of your product data infrastructure. No need to complicate things.
parameters.Subtitle: Eando X makes it easy to declare all emission data associated with the production of the goods your company imports or exports.

parameters.Title: Advanced data management built on deep linking.
parameters.Text:
Managing the manufacturing data on all your products can quickly get complex. This can easily reduce the quality and accuracy of your reports.

Eando X takes a novel approach and splits up your products data into separate entities like components, packaging, transport, factories and more. 

Reuse entities across your product range and have their updates be propagated throughout your catalog.

parameters.Title: Anyone can contribute - from team to supplier.
parameters.Text:
Managing complex data calls for deep experts and spreadsheet hackers. This raises the barrier of entry for collaborators.

The Eando X tooling simplifies data entry and comprehension, while still allowing for spreadsheet import/export. This allows anyone from the team to contribute on their level.

Components that you order can be requested from your suppliers. This increases the accuracy of your data reports, and removes the need for NDA's and followups.

parameters.Title: Automate away the tedious tasks. Focus on what's important.
parameters.Text:
With the right tools, CBAM compliance doesn't have to be hard. When you no longer have to focus on meeting compliance, you can use it as a way of driving business innovation, and getting ahead of your competition.

An investment in our automation software is an investment in leading the way in sustainable business practices. Transform your CBAM process and watch your business thrive in an increasingly regulated world.
